channel.title: Adding a teleport choice to npcdialogue
channel.description: I want to add a "yes", "no" for npc dialogue. if you click yes i want it to tele to a location. I know how to add dialogue, but im not sure how to make it tele.

item.title: Adding a teleport choice to npcdialogue
item.dc:creator: @N0vlafe N0vlafe
item.description:
@N0vlafe wrote:

just type the x n y coordinates under the words (that a hint not acutally how to do the thing)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a teleport choice to npcdialogue

item.title: Adding a teleport choice to npcdialogue
item.dc:creator: @Chrisofwow Chrisofwow
item.description:
@Chrisofwow wrote:

Actionbutton packet?.. can you be more specific?

thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2009, 03:02:27 pm[/size][hr]Nvm, i’ve decided to add a tele effect. So it will be a multiple choice teleport. but the ‘no’ choice won’t take you there. Hopefully i can add this to a portal.

Read full topic
